FuncDef: This command assigns a static MAC address to the endpoint. In the FDB, the static MAC is then associated with the active spoke-SDP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the static MAC address to the endpoint. Values-6-byte mac-address (xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx) Cannot be all zeros.
This keyword is mandatory while creating a static MAC.
